name: Passwords
content:
Description: Rankings and analysis on most popular passwords in use on the internet, and their security / safety level. 

[Source](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2020/2020-01-14/readme.md#passwordscsv)

Columns:

* Rank (number): popularity in the source database of released passwords
* Password (string): Actual text of the password
* Category (string): category of the password, such as alphanumeric, someone's name, or a sports team
* Value (string): estimated time to crack the password with online guessing, in various time units (see next column)
* Time unit (string): estimated time in seconds, days, years etc. it would take to crack that password
* Strength (number): Quality of password where 10 is highest, 1 is lowest
